name: Biker Zone
description: A responsive bikers shop website made using HTML and Tailwind CSS framework.

name: Gamer Zone
description: A gaming community website where users can share their games with others and discuss about the latest trends in the gaming world.

name: Flower Shop
description: A simple flower shop website created with the help of HTML and Tailwind CSS framework.

name: Fruit Shop
description: An ecommerce fruit shopping site built in HTML and Tailwind CSS.

name: Tea House
description: A virtual tea house where you can order your favorite teas and drinks.

name: Personal Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects.

name: Geometry Genius
description: A math game to test your knowledge about different geometric shapes.

name: Simple Bank
description: A simple banking system for users to deposit, withdraw, transfer money or check their account balance.

name: Summer Sale
description: An ecommerce site for a summer sale with discounted products.

name: Stop Watch
description: A simple stop watch application built using HTML, CSS & Javascript.

name: Donation Campaign
description: A web app to create and manage donation campaigns. Users can set up their own campaigns, add supporters and track the progress of the fundraising.

name: Dragon News
description: An app to share news articles with friends or family members. It uses firebase for real time database and authentication.

name: Knowledge Cafe
description: A virtual cafe where you can learn new things by buying coffee and donuts.

name: Career Hub
description: Find your dream job with Career hub! It is a platform that connects job seekers to potential employers based on their skills and interests.

name: Automotive Shop
description: An ecommerce website for an automotive shop with user authentication, shopping cart,admin dashboard etc.

name: Hire Sync
description: An application for finding a job or hiring someone to do the job.

name: Study Group
description: A platform that allows students to find study groups based on their interests.
